name: Chloe's Inner Demons
description:
Chloe is a woman fighting to get her life back after a traumatic relashionship.

She seeks for help while her inner demons tries to get to her, trough panic, ansiety and depression.

And she needs all the help possible... yours included.

Get deep down into Chloe's mind and help her to heal 

but be aware... your choices matters.

HOW TO PLAY

The comands are pretty basic, you can use W A S D To move the caracter across the space and use 1 2 3 4 5 6 or left click button to select the options that will appear for you. 

During the game, you will be talking with Dr. Wood, and your answers are important to understand the main story.

Also during the game, you will be asked to do some little tasks to help Chloe fight her anxiety and panic.

A SMALL HINT FOR YOU

if you need it, of course

For the breathing task, all you have to do is conect the symbols in your screen using you left click button of your mouse

Now, for the panic task, you just have to keep calm and maintain the mouse arrow inside the symbol.

The rest is just enjoy the story

WHO YOU PLAYING WITH?

Well, our game goes around Chloe, a woman who goes to a psychiatrist trying to uderstand about the traumas in her life.

You will be playing as a representation of Chloe inside her own head. 

During the game, Dr. WoodS will help and guide you through, just talk to him ok?

You will meet some other caracters too, but without distress, they just want to help you

 - And the demons? - You ask 

Well, they can't hurt you, so don be scared... just a little

WHAT ABOUT THE TEAM???

Well my dear friend...
